titleStmt.title: Pseuchographia anthropomagica or, a magicall description of the soul: wherein is set forth the nature, genesis and exodus of it. By Agricola Carpenter.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, Agricola.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Browne at the sign of the guilded Acorn in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
